name: The Curious Case Study Of Mark Keeble
name_original: The Curious Case Study Of Mark Keeble
description:
This was a game I made for my 'exit-interview' during my grade twelve year, where we basically had to prove that I, as grade twelve student, was a  functional human being. I passed with flying colors! I couldn't tell you how though because I probably spent more time making this game than I did studying for my upcoming physics test.

Essentially just a short story with a few trinkets/items scattered across the ground which aim to inform about my favorite/most memorable experiences throughout my high school experience.
